articles.description: Fellowships across the venerable Middle-Earth MMORPG have gathered to commemorate the death of Bilbo Baggins actor Sir Ian Holm, who passed this week.
articles.content: This weekend, Lord Of The Rings Online players gathered to commemorate the life of British actor Sir Ian Holm, who passed away aged 88 last Friday. Despite a filmography spanning over five decades, t… [+1653 chars]

articles.author: Bethany Minelle
articles.title: Kurt Cobain's MTV Unplugged guitar sells for $6m at auction - Sky News
articles.description: The Nirvana star played the guitar on the live MTV performance in 1993, five months before his untimely death aged just 27.
